imdb.title: Shiki
imdb.plot: When many deaths occur in the quiet village of Sotoba, Doctor Toshio Ozaki initially suspects an epidemic but soon becomes convinced that something else is causing them.

episodes.title: First Blood
episodes.plot: Living in a small village, Megumi's two main interests are classmate Natsuno Yuuki and a European-style house on a hill. One day, when her fascination with the house leads her to climb the hill, she vanishes.

episodes.title: Second Decay
episodes.plot: After Toru's attack, Natsuno warns Kaori and her brother to escape the village before they fall victim to the vampires as well.

episodes.title: Third Tragedy
episodes.plot: The population of the village grows thin as the blood-sucking okiagari claim more victims, including Toshio?s wife. With no strength left in his body, Natsuno invites Toru in for a last feeding.

episodes.title: Fourth Death
episodes.plot: Kaori?s father suddenly collapses. At the clinic, Toshio studies his wife?s corpse for clues on how to combat the vampires.

episodes.title: Fifth Deceit
episodes.plot: The Shiki are bent on keeping the outside world in the dark about the deaths in Sotoba. When Toshio threatens to expose them, a member of the Kanemasa mansion pays him a visit.

episodes.title: Sixth Skull
episodes.plot: No one in Sotoba - the village surrounded by death - is safe, as a frustrated Toshio fails to find a cure for the epidemic strangling his town. Convinced that Megumi has risen from the dead, Natsuno researches darker sources.

episodes.title: Seventh Killing Spirit
episodes.plot: As Shiki continue to rid the village of the living, Seishin finally makes a move. On another late night at the clinic, Toshio gets a visitor.

episodes.title: Eighth Night
episodes.plot: Natsuno?s return from death grants him a visit from Tatsumi. Hoping to enjoy his last days amongst the living, Toshio takes the mistress of Kanemasa to the village?s yearly festival.

episodes.title: Ninth Coffin
episodes.plot: The villagers band together to free their town from the grips of the Shiki. Meanwhile, Tatsumi decides what to do with Seishin.

episodes.title: Tenth Mourning
episodes.plot: Toshio and Natsuno's suspicions were true. Okiagari - creatures of legend that were once human that feed on the lives of others - are now stalking Natsuno.

episodes.title: Eleventh Slaughter
episodes.plot: While Sotoba's villagers are debating the cause of the frequent deaths, the town shaman points her finger at the residents of Kanemasa mansion.

episodes.title: Twelfth Decay
episodes.plot: After Toru's attack, Natsuno warns Kaori and her brother to escape the village before they fall victim to the vampires as well.

episodes.title: Thirteenth Tragedy
episodes.plot: The population of the village grows thin as the blood-sucking okiagari claim more victims, including Toshio's wife. With no strength left in his body, Natsuno invites Toru in for a last feeding.

episodes.title: Fourteenth Death
episodes.plot: Kaori's father suddenly collapses. At the clinic, Toshio studies his wife's corpse for clues on how to combat the vampires.

episodes.title: Fifteenth Deceit
episodes.plot: The Shiki are bent on keeping the outside world in the dark about the deaths in Sotoba. When Toshio threatens to expose them, a member of the Kanemasa mansion pays him a visit.

episodes.title: Sixteenth Skull
episodes.plot: Sunako calls Toru to Kanemasa to share a piece of her past with him. The Shiki's curse looms over Kaori as she finds her mother still in bed, pale and drained of energy.

episodes.title: Seventeenth Killing Spirit
episodes.plot: As Shiki continue to rid the village of the living, Seishin finally makes a move. On another late night at the clinic, Toshio gets a visitor.

episodes.title: Eighteenth Death
episodes.plot: Natsuno's return from death grants him a visit from Tatsumi. Hoping to enjoy his last days amongst the living, Toshio takes the mistress of Kanemasa to the village's yearly festival.

episodes.title: Nineteenth Coffin
episodes.plot: The villagers band together to free their town from the grips of the Shiki. Meanwhile, Tatsumi decides what to do with Seishin.

episodes.title: Twentieth Mourning
episodes.plot: Toshio leads those who haven't joined the Shiki - or fled the village - on a raging, blood-soaked hunt, but there's still one place they haven't looked. As the vampires strike back, Seishin continues his watch over Sunako.

episodes.title: Twenty-First Slaughter
episodes.plot: While Sotoba's villagers are debating the cause of the frequent deaths, the town shaman points her finger at the residents of Kanemasa mansion.

episodes.title: The Final Hunt
episodes.plot: The last of the Shiki try to escape the village, but one of their own kind stands in Tatsumi's way. What fate remains for the vampires and Sotoba"the village surrounded by death"

episodes.title: Twentieth Mourning and Offense
episodes.plot: In a flashback, a human Nao talks to Chiyomi Hasegawa and Hasegawa at their coffee shop. She happily tells them about her family and how happy that make her.

episodes.title: Twenty-First Blood and Offense
episodes.plot: Motoko's concerns for her father-in-law's health are brushed off as exaggerated worry, but soon her husband and children fall victim to the Shiki's curse. Wandering the bloodied streets alone amidst the panic, the shaken widow calculates her revenge.
